channel.title: Howcould I make it so when you killer another player, 1k cash goes into your bag
channel.description:
So, I want to make it so when you Kill a player, you will get 1k cash into your inventory. I do not have PkPoints system set up on my server and don't want one. I've tried this for 2 hours and can't figure out this simple thing.
Heres an example.
[i]2 players come along in the wilderness. Goerge, and Dick. Goerge unleashes his special attacks Dick dies Goerge recieves 1000 coins in his inventory Goerge cheers while Dick is smashing his keyboard[/i]
[b]So how do it so goerge gets that 1k cash?[/b]
Thanks :P

item.title: Howcould I make it so when you killer another player, 1k cash goes into your bag
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

[quote=“suomirunee, post:8, topic:222579”][quote author=sasanated32 link=topic=292329.msg2354351#msg2354351 date=1217226129]
Can any of you’s help me.I have a server but people carnt log onto my server ip i made WHY? i have portfoward Help!!!
[/quote]
Stfu, talk in your own topic.[/quote]
Agreed

Now can i please get my answer

Read full topic

item.title: Howcould I make it so when you killer another player, 1k cash goes into your bag
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

I have so it gives cash depending on the opponents cb lvl. Ill try to help you a bit in 1k.
If you have this void public void PKz() { or something like you pk a player then add this to it somewhere addItem(995, 1000); I don’t think that helps much, but I didn’t code the pk reward.

Read full topic
